name: Steamy Ride
description:
In Steamy Rider you control a steampunk car as you drive through a wasteland littered with junk and a deep cave system as you train to become the Steamy Rider. Be careful not to run out of coal or land upside down as your drive will end.

Controls:

Press A and D to tilt the car backwards/forwards

Press W to jump  (once you have bought it)

Press N or Left Shift to use Nitro (once you have bought it)

Press M to mute the game audio

Created by:

Bjarki Freyr Rúnarsson

Daníel Heiðar Tómasson

Eyþór Haraldsson

Guðmundur Gauti Jóhannsson
